T02D3253:15b-1: mah'a sa ha sra pra marda n'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3253:15b-3: stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3253:15b-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i tshul gyis sna tshogs padma
T02D3253:15b-5: dang zla ba la yi ge tsum las nges par
T02D3253:15b-6: byung ba'i stong chen po rab tu 'joms par bdag
T02D3253:15b-8: sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig ma phyag drug ma /
T02D3253:15b-9: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum gyis ni ral gri dang mda' bsnams shing mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3253:15b-10: g-yon pa'i phyag gsum gyis ni gzhu dang /
T02D3253:15b-11: zhags pa dang mdung bsnams pa'o//
T02D3253:15b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang ldan pa
T02D3253:15b-13: gzugs dang lang tsho dang sgeg pa dang ldan par
T02D3253:15b-14: gyur pa / dbu rgyan la rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3253:15b-15: dang ldan pa zla ba dang padma'i gdan dang ldan
T02D3253:15b-16: zhing zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3253:15b-17: 'di ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs so ;
